thread.title: Trump Receives Oval Office Briefing on Derivatives Rules

author: Andrew Ackerman
title: Trump Receives Oval Office Briefing on Derivatives Rules
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Donald Trump met with the top U.S. derivatives regulator in the Oval Office on Wednesday, amid tensions between American and European policy makers on their efforts to coordinate on postcrisis regulation. 

The meeting between Mr. Trump and Commodity Futures Trading Commission Chairman J. Christopher Giancarlo, which the White House announced Tuesday, was expected to involve a discussion of coming European regulations that Mr. Giancarlo fears could unfairly crimp U.S. companies operating on the continent,...
